title: Windows 11 is getting a built-in passkey manager for Windows Hello
description: Microsoft is expanding support for passkeys in Windows 11 to make it more secure to log into websites and apps using biometric authentication. [...]

title: Anatsa Android trojan now steals banking info from users in US, UK
description: A new mobile malware campaign since March 2023 pushes the Android banking trojan 'Anatsa' to online banking customers in the U.S., the U.K., Germany, Austria, and Switzerland. [...]

title: New PindOS JavaScript dropper deploys Bumblebee, IcedID malware
description: Security researchers discovered a new malicious tool they named PindOS that delivers the Bumblebee and IcedID malware typically associated with ransomware attacks. [...]

title: Hackers steal data of 45,000 New York City students in MOVEit breach
description: The New York City Department of Education (NYC DOE) says hackers stole documents containing the sensitive personal information of up to 45,000 students from its MOVEit Transfer server. [...]

title: Inside Threat Actors: Dark Web Forums vs. Illicit Telegram Communities
description: In this article, @flaresystems explores threat actors and their activities on dark web forums versus illicit Telegram communities. [...]

title: Man charged in US for running 'Monopoly' darknet drug market
description: A 33-year-old man from Serbia has been extradited from Austria to the United States to face charges of running a criminal darknet narcotics marketplace called "Monopoly Market." [...]

title: Suncor Energy cyberattack impacts Petro-Canada gas stations
description: Petro-Canada gas stations across Canada are impacted by technical problems preventing customers from paying with credit card or rewards points as its parent company, Suncor Energy, discloses they suffered a cyberattack. [...]
